input.sentences: found these century old photos in my grandpa 's photoalbum !
i think this building is still standing . it looks just as amazing now .
can you believe this is where he lived ?
the architecture back then was really something else .
i ca n't imagine how people managed to make all this without modern machinery .
output.sentences: I flipped through the photos in the photo album that grandpa had.
He had many pictures of a special, still standing, building that to me was amazing.
I wondered if the people who were standing in front of one house that grandpa had taken a photo of were the people who lived there
Other photos taken of buildings seemed to be taken, not to show how people lived at the time, but simply for the architecture.
People in this time clearly lived differently than we do in modern times, but they managed to get by in their own way.
